name: Duo
description: This app integrates with Duo to perform generic, investigative actions

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity. This action checks the connection and configuration

username.description: Specify a user name (or username alias) to look up for a single user

offset.description: At which to start user retrieval

actions.description: Clear all existing bypass codes for the user and return newly generated bypass codes

count.description: Number of new bypass codes to create. At most 10 codes (the default) can be created at a time. Codes will be generated randomly

codes.description: CSV(Comma Separated Value) string of codes to use. Mutually exclusive with count.(exact nine digits)

reuse_count.description: The number of times generated bypass codes can be used. If 0, the codes will have an infinite reuse_count. Default: 1

valid_secs.description: The number of seconds for which generated bypass codes remain valid. If 0 (the default) the codes will never expire

actions.description: Associate a phone with the user

phone_id.description: Phone ID to associate with the user

actions.description: Create a new phone with a specified phone number and other parameters
Change the details of the phone

number.description: The new number with country code

actions.description: Delete the phone details for specified phone ID
Generate a Duo Mobile activation code and send it to the phone via SMS
actions.verbose: This action requires phone id that contains valid phone number and it will fail if phone's type or platform is Unknown.

valid_secs.description: The number of seconds this activation code remains valid(Max sec: 2592000)

install.description: Mark checkbox to installation SMS message to be sent before the activation messages. Default: false(Not marked)

example_values: To activate the app, click and open this link with Duo Mobile: https://m-cc57ea11.duosecurity.com/android/NRuHozriSW3sY1yT9WMn
Welcome to Duo! To install the Duo Mobile app, click this link: http://m-cc57ea11.duosecurity.com
Send activation code via SMS successful

username.description: The user to update or create via directory sync. This should be the same as the value for the user's username attribute in the source directory as configured in the sync
